Name: Astelpot Duo Lv.1
Description: Recommend: Stormblade, Wind Knight, Heavy Guardian, Marksman, and Shield Knight.
Description$english: Recommend: Stormblade, Wind Knight, Heavy Guardian, Marksman, and Shield Knight.
Description2$english: A simplified version of the traditional family feast in Asterleeds, using more mushrooms to enhance umami while reducing the complexity of the preparation process and saving costs.

recipes.Name: Astelpot Duo
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 80% and 20%, respectively.
A simplified everyday rendition of the Asterleeds family's cherished feast—enriched with extra mushrooms for deeper umami flavor, streamlined for effortless preparation, and delightfully budget-friendly.
recipes.Des$english:
Crafting yields products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 80% and 20%, respectively.
A simplified everyday rendition of the Asterleeds family's cherished feast—enriched with extra mushrooms for deeper umami flavor, streamlined for effortless preparation, and delightfully budget-friendly.

NeedMaterial.Name: Premium Fish Meat
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Finely processed fresh Fish Meat, retaining only the essence of the fish's tenderness through exquisite knife work, requiring only a skilled cook to transform it into a gourmet delicacy.

recipes.Name: Premium Fish Meat - Beginner
recipes.Des:
Can process fish you caught into Premium Fish Meat that can be used as high-grade ingredients.
This process yields 7-8 products.
recipes.Des$english:
Can process fish you caught into Premium Fish Meat that can be used as high-grade ingredients.
This process yields 7-8 products.

NeedMaterial.Name: Season Pass EXP
NeedMaterial.Description:
Earned by completing activity goals. When Season Pass EXP reaches a certain level, the Season Pass level can be increased.
Increasing the Season Pass level allows you to claim generous rewards.
NeedMaterial.Description$english:
Earned by completing activity goals. When Season Pass EXP reaches a certain level, the Season Pass level can be increased.
Increasing the Season Pass level allows you to claim generous rewards.

NeedMaterial.Name: Season Pass EXP (Not counted toward weekly limit)
NeedMaterial.Name$english: Season Pass EXP (Not counted toward weekly limit)
NeedMaterial.Description:
Earned by completing daily activity goals. Once enough EXP is accumulated, your Season Pass level increases.
Higher Season Pass levels grant generous rewards.
Season Pass EXP earned does not count toward the weekly limit.

NeedMaterial.Name: Asterscad
NeedMaterial.Description: This is a fish. In Asterleeds, some fish have delicious meat and are often made into tasty seafood dishes. Of course, there are also some highly ornamental fish, so Guild merchants also collect them.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: This is a fish. In Asterleeds, some fish have delicious meat and are often made into tasty seafood dishes. Of course, there are also some highly ornamental fish, so Guild merchants also collect them.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: It is said that some fishing enthusiasts even dismantle their houses just to build a large aquarium to display and show off their collection of these treasures.

NeedMaterial.Name: Glowshroom
NeedMaterial.Description: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Growing in damp, shadowy environments, it emits an eerie glow at night.

NeedMaterial.Name: Butter
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Rich in nutrients but high in fat, so don't overconsume it.

NeedMaterial.Name: Fresh Milk
NeedMaterial.Description: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: The pure white nectar that fuels morning energy.

NeedMaterial.Name: Nine-Flavor Spice
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: As the name suggests. Just a little bit can make ordinary food exude a charming and rich flavor. One bite, and it instantly hits your taste buds!

NeedMaterial.Name: Scallop
NeedMaterial.Description: An item found during wilderness exploration.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: An item found during wilderness exploration.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A sharp-shelled scallop that grows along the beaches of the Asteria Plains. Juicy and full of flavor.

NeedMaterial.Name: Raw Fish Meat
NeedMaterial.Description: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: The meat obtained from swimming fish, the final taste completely depends on the adventurer's cooking skills.
